fullName: Lucy  Upton ğŸ“ Childrenâ€™s Dietitian & Feeding Specialist
caption:
I am absolutely delighted to now FINALLY share with you that Iâ€™ve have poured 15 years of childrenâ€™s nutrition and feeding experience into one BIG book, written with YOU (parents) in mind aiming to give you a one stop shop of confidence, clarity and advice about kids nutrition and feeding - from birth to preschool.

My debut book - â€˜The Ultimate Guide to Childrenâ€™s Nutrition; How to nurture happy healthy eaters in the first five years is a â€˜bibleâ€™ pack full of must-have information, expert insight,and practical tips, this handbook is your one-stop,essential guide to feeding your child in the first five years. Itâ€™s being released on the 8th May 2025  and you can preorder now (link in bio) 

It covers:

âœ… Developmental milestones and nutritional needs for every stage of your childâ€™s life, from newborn to preschool - shared in a digestible and actionable way 
âœ… Judgment-free guidance on milk feeding, whether from the breast, formula, or a combination of both
âœ… Expert advice on starting solids: when to begin, introducing new foods, navigating different tastes and textures, safely introducing food allergens and much much more
âœ… The toddler years: toddler nutrition, tackling fussy eating, debunking food myths, and overcoming common feeding challenges
âœ… How to build a positive relationship with food,promote healthy eating habits, and create a balanced approach to nutrition that lasts a lifetime
âœ… Insights on how best your childâ€™s gut health, brain health, immune health and more 
âœ… Managing ultra- processed foods (UPFs)
âœ… Supplements 
âœ… An SOS section at the end of each chapter, based on worried and questions you all ask me weekly - from food allergies to tummy troubles like constipation - with solutions to common concerns 
âœ… Real-world advice, myth busting and FAQs from Lucyâ€™s online parenting community
âœ… Peer reviewed by six specialists (including dietitians, doctors and psychologists)

â¤ï¸ Preorders really do mean everything- especially to a new author like me, as it lets booksellers know publications that people are interested in and want to read! You usually get the book at the best price too!

Thank YOU - this is because of and for all you you xx

caption:
Week 12Â of Healthy EatingÂ tips from our DietitianÂ Lilly.

Be mindful of how much you put on your plate. Start with smaller portions and only go back for more if youâ€™re genuinely still hungry, try to listen to your hunger and fullness cues! This not only helps you maintain your weight but also minimizes food waste.

Check out more atÂ dining.uconn.edu/mindful-dining
